review.reviewBody: Samyotech delivered our MVP in exactly 90 days. Their process was transparent, and they helped us validate our product-market fit before investing heavily.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to build an MVP?

acceptedAnswer.text: At IT United, we can build and launch your MVP in just 90 days. Our streamlined process focuses on essential features to get your product to market quickly while validating your business idea. The timeline includes market research, design, development, testing, and launch support.

mainEntity.name: Why do I need an MVP for my startup?

acceptedAnswer.text: 38% of startups fail because they run out of cash, and 35% fail due to no market demand. An MVP helps validate your idea early, conserve resources, and reduce risk before full-scale development. It allows you to test your core hypothesis with real users and gather feedback to refine your product.

mainEntity.name: What is included in MVP development services?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our MVP development services include comprehensive market research, strategic feature prioritization, rapid prototyping, agile development, rigorous testing, launch support, and post-launch iteration based on user feedback. We also provide analytics integration to track user behavior and validate assumptions.

mainEntity.name: Who can benefit from MVP development?

acceptedAnswer.text: MVPs benefit startups validating new ideas with limited budgets, mid-sized businesses testing innovations before major investments, and large enterprises exploring new markets or products with minimal risk. Any business looking to validate market demand before full product development can benefit.

mainEntity.name: How much does MVP development cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: MVP development costs vary based on complexity, features, and technology stack. Typically, costs range from $10,000 for simple MVPs to $100,000+ for more complex solutions. At IT United, we provide custom quotes based on your specific requirements and business goals.

mainEntity.name: What technologies do you use for MVP development?

acceptedAnswer.text: We use modern, scalable technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, AWS, and mobile frameworks like React Native and Flutter. The technology stack is chosen based on your specific requirements, scalability needs, and target audience.

mainEntity.name: Can you help scale my MVP after launch?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we provide post-launch support and scaling services. After validating your MVP with real users, we help you iterate based on feedback, add new features, optimize performance, and scale your infrastructure to handle growing user demand.

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between MVP and a full product?

acceptedAnswer.text: An MVP includes only the core features necessary to solve the main problem and validate your business hypothesis. A full product includes all planned features, polish, and optimizations. Starting with an MVP reduces risk and development costs while allowing you to learn from real users before investing in full development.
